entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Performance regression looping over large arrays #114047
  • Parallel.For code with native / unmanaged memory (span, ref, ref struct) #114045
  • [API Proposal]: DynamicallyAccessedMembers for type arguments of the containing type #114044
  • 'ComWrappers.ReleaseObjects' also passes aggregated objects #114043

Closed

  • JIT emits additional prolog/epilog when return value in distinct branches is equal #114050
  • [Proposal] Add new overload to Math.Truncate #40456
  • Complex.Log(Complex value, Complex baseValue) #40897
  • Question : What is the most performant way to represent constant System.Runtime.Intrinsics.VectorXXX<T>? #40900
  • stack smashing detected on fedora 41 dotnet-sdk-8.0 #114021
  • Disabling `IlcScanReflection` noticeably decreases the app size #113919

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm][interp] Add unsigned versions of the unsigned narrow intrinsics #114052
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • ML-KEM: Contract Tests #114051
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • Add field access support to CoreCLR Interpreter #114049
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • [TEST] No-op comment change #114048
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, test-enhancement, area-VM-coreclr
  • Improve error handling of unknown arch #114046
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 134.0.6998.165, windows: 135.0.7049.41 #114042
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • [mono][interp] Check packedsimd first on browser #113743
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

Updated

  • Enable more constant foldings for switch ops using assertions #113998
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RuntimeAsync] Move runtime async to the main repo #113976
    new-api-needs-documentation, runtime-coreclr, runtime-async
  • add support for parallel Connect #106374
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation
  • TypeMap API (Dynamic implementation) #113954
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Simple math intrinsics #113689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix crossgen2 sometimes emitting tokens from the wrong module into R2R output #114029
    NO-MERGE, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix improperly contained BroadcastScalarToVector(CreateScalar(GT_LONG)) #113994
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • missing opportunities in constant folding around bitwise ops #99136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Rename rapidjson helper functions #114017
    area-Host
  • Don't pass stack pointer in ECX on x86 funclet ABI #113792
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix EH and stack walking on linux-x86 #113972
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Stackwalk support for interpreted frames #113900
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Add Decimal32, Decimal64, Decimal128 #100729
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Shrink data for scalar instructions with contained const vectors #114040
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
